meanings.definition: Wealthy individuals who hold power and influence due to their immense wealth.
meanings.sent1: The plutocrats in the city owned many expensive buildings.
meanings.sent2: The country's plutocrats controlled most of the businesses.
meanings.sent3: The plutocrats decided to have a fancy party on their private island.
meanings.sent4: The plutocrats' influence spread like wildfire through the financial markets.
meanings.sent5: The image of the plutocrats lounging in luxury stuck in everyone's minds.
